title: Looking for TOP/JUNG/ADC/SUPPORT  For a BRONZE TEAM
body:
IN GAME NAME: Zowie the Pitbul

If you want to be in the team , please add me. Tell me what you want to do for lanes and 3 mains for that lane..

Team name: Liquid Freeze

replies.body: I would like to top for younguys
I added you, my name is MrTittyMcSwag on League. I can play Top, ADC, Mid or Jungle. Please consider me :D I have skype too, might get a mic soon. :3
